name: Super Metroid: Tallon IV Tours: Chozo Ruins Rumble
overview: Get ready to rumble... Starting with the elevator room at the Ruin's entrance and extending through to the Sunchamber, this is a map of Metroid Prime's Chozo Ruins, in SNEStroid 2D. It is somewhat condensed compared to the GCN game- all the boring tunnels are gone, and save rooms have merged into the rooms they were connected to. Other "main" rooms have been combined as well, when I felt it appropriate. The route diverges slightly as a result, early in the game. I hope you enjoy your stay on Tallon IV!
